Package org.jclouds.glesys.domain

Class Summary
AllowedArgumentsForCreateServer Sets the allowed arguments for some of the functions in this module such as disksize, cpucores etc.
AllowedArgumentsForCreateServer.Builder  
Archive Information about an archive
Archive.Builder  
ArchiveAllowedArguments The allowed arguments for archive manipulation, such as archivesize
ArchiveAllowedArguments.Builder  
ArchiveDetails Detailed information about an archive volume.
ArchiveDetails.Builder  
Console Connection information to connect to a server with VNC.
Console.Builder  
Cost The Cost class contains information about the cost of a server
Cost.Builder  
Domain Domain data for a Glesys account.
Domain.Builder  
DomainRecord DNS record data.
DomainRecord.Builder  
EmailAccount Detailed information on an Email Account
EmailAccount.Builder  
EmailOverview Structure containing all information about e-mail addresses for a GleSYS account
EmailOverview.Builder  
EmailOverviewDomain Detailed information about e-mail settings for a single domain
EmailOverviewDomain.Builder  
EmailOverviewSummary Summary information of e-mail settings and limits for a GleSYS account
EmailOverviewSummary.Builder  
Ip Represents an ip address used by a server.
Ip.Builder  
IpDetails Represents detailed information about an IP address.
IpDetails.Builder  
OSTemplate Operating system template
OSTemplate.Builder  
ResourceUsage Detailed information on usage
ResourceUsage.Builder  
Server Listing of a server.
Server.Builder  
ServerDetails Detailed information about a server such as cpuCores, hardware configuration (cpu, memory and disk), ip adresses, cost, transfer, os and more.
ServerDetails.Builder  
ServerLimit Detailed information about an OpenVZ server's limits
ServerLimit.Builder  
ServerSpec  
ServerSpec.Builder  
ServerStatus Detailed information server status including hardware usage (cpu, memory and disk), bandwidth and up-time.
ServerStatus.Builder  
ServerUptime Represents an 'uptime' duration of server in a Glesys cloud
